job_details.Vacaturetitel: Data Architect - Principal Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
     * Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
     * Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
     * Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter.
     * Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
     * Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
     * Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
     * Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
     * Manage all phases of technology development.
     * Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
     * Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
     * Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
     * Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
     * Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.
job_details.full_text:
Data Architect - Principal Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)

* Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
     * Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
     * Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
     * Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter.
     * Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
     * Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
     * Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
     * Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
     * Manage all phases of technology development.
     * Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
     * Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
     * Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
     * Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
     * Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes core ML engineering responsibilities such as developing and implementing technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering, and Machine Learning Engineering domains. It also highlights setting standards for engineering excellence, guiding technical colleagues, owning architectural decisions, and managing technology development phases. The focus on data science, data engineering, and ML engineering, along with the mention of 'predictive models' implicitly through 'Machine Learning Engineering domains', aligns strongly with the ML Engineer profile. While there's a software development aspect, it's in the context of supporting ML/Data Science rather than building standalone user-facing applications, which is characteristic of an ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements' indicates an understanding of business needs and translating them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains' directly mentions Data Engineering as a domain of specification development.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains' includes Machine Learning Engineering, which inherently involves model development and implementation.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'determine needs for new software, platforms and applications' and 'Manage all phases of technology development' points to general software development lifecycle management and requirements gathering for new applications.
job_tasks.phrase: determine needs for new software, platforms and applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system' points to building and integrating software components.
job_tasks.phrase: system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines' is a core aspect of ensuring production-readiness and maintainability of systems, which falls under operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility' implies managing the operational aspects of deployed systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility
